message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled value. Given its unique features and quality, we believe it is worth $15000. We are confident that you will find this investment highly rewarding. Please let us know if you have any questions or would like to proceed with the purchase.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $15000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product, which is a fair price considering its value to me. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of our product. To reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I propose a price of $12500 for the product. This price reflects the high quality and value it offers while remaining within your budget considerations. I hope this proposal will be agreeable to you.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $12500.  I'm still a bit higher than what I'm comfortable with, but I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11250. This price reflects the value I see in the product, while still being within my budget.

Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and am pleased to offer the product to you at $11875. This price is reflective of the product's quality and value, while also accommodating your budget constraints. I hope this proposal meets your expectations.
